title: What it takes to get an S+
body:
Wanted to try a tanky/bruiser build I made as nid top. It was a 4v5. (we were the 4, Braum rq). Check the stats out! 

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/121169525/200093284?tab=overview

Carried. 

Great team effort though!

replies.body:
Damn Braum jng though. Those are some tasty stats right there, I feel sorry for the other team.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
HAHA thanks! Yeah.. They got pummeled. They stayed positive though, no toxicity. Thank god!
You guys didn't even get any Dragon buffs the entire game. What a turn around! Good job!
I know! It was SUCH an amazing game. Games like those keep me hooked <3
